name: tngbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: syl5eq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c4), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(Base ` c3))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(Base ` c4)=(Base ` c3))

⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 →(Base ` c4)=(Base ` c3))

body.origin:

⊣ c3 =(c4[toNrmGrp]c0)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]9
